title: Taking off in French
creator_credit: Harry Mehlman and Victoria. Dept. of Education and Early Childhood Development
brief_description: Teachers from Asumption College, Kilmore, and Nunawading High School are shown putting into practice the “Eclair” approach to the teaching of the French language.
